name: Lucky Cooky
description:
You are a worker in a cookie factory.You need to put correct cookie on the production line in time.And  a bit like of Mahjong, some combinations of cookies will make you get more coins.But you need to explore these combinations yourself.

The game is  very challenging and hardcore , simple to start,but hard to master.It is very addictive,I played hours of this game and never get tired of it.

Press SPACE to switch cookie.Press ENTER to put the cookie.

Hope you guys will enjoy this game. Leave your suggestions on the bottom of this page.

join us on discord:  https://discord.gg/dQGnmd7t2d
